name: Three Kids in a Trenchcoat - Minor Theft Auto
name_original: Three Kids in a Trenchcoat - Minor Theft Auto
description:
Created for the Multiplayer Game Jam

Requires port 7777 forwarded for hosting

To play with your friends you must port forward 7777, hit host and share your external IP with your friends to have them join you.

Three Kids in a Trench Coat: Minor Theft Auto 

You and your pals must drive from your rural home to the big city in search of free ice cream! 

How -- with a grown-up car, of course! 

Coordination is key! 

It takes a team effort: 

Player 1 (Baby Driver) - Steers the wheel! 

Player 2 (Peddle Pusher) - Controls gas and break 

Players 3 + 4 (Lookouts) - Sees the road ahead clearly! 

Can you make it town? Do you want that ice cream bad enough? A baby's gotta do what a baby's gotta do, you know!
